template.name: characteristic (symbolic)
template.description: Template for characteristic with symbolic type

templates.template: characteristic ${NAME} { description "${description}" documentation "${documentation}" symbolic { numberOfChars 30 [ ] values { '${valuename}' { description "${valuedescription}" documentation "${valuedocumentation}" } } } status ${status:Enum('Status')} group "${group}" [ ] }

template.name: characteristic (numeric)
template.description: Template for characteristic with numeric type

templates.template: characteristic ${NAME} { description "${description}" documentation "${documentation}" numeric { numberOfChars 15 decimalPlaces 3 [ negativeValuesAllowed ] values { 1 2 3 } } status ${status:Enum('Status')} group "${group}" [ ] }
class (300)${NAME} { description "${description}" status ${status:Enum('Status')} characteristics { ${cstic:CrossReference('Class.characteristics')} ${cursor} } }
constraint ${NAME} { description "${description}" documentation "${documentation}" status ${status:Enum('Status')} group "${group}" source { OBJECTS: ${cursor} CONDITION: RESTRICTION: INFERENCES: } }

dependencynet ${NAME} { description "${description}" documentation "${documentation}" status ${status:Enum('Status')} group "${group}" ${constr:CrossReference('DependencyNet.constraints')} ${cursor} }
interfacedesign ${NAME} { characteristicgrup ${cgname} { description "${description}" ${cstic:CrossReference('CharacteristicGroup.characteristics')} ${cursor} } }
material ${NAME} { description "${description}" type HAWA }

material ${NAME} { description "${description}" type KMAT billofmaterial { items { 0010 ${item:CrossReference('BOMItem.material')} } } classes { ${class:CrossReference('Material.classes')} } configurationprofile '${profilename}' { status ${status:Enum('Status')} bomapplication SD02 uidesign ${ui_design:CrossReference('ConfigurationProfile.uidesign')} ${dnet:CrossReference('ConfigurationProfile.dependencyNets')} 0010 ${proc:CrossReference('ConfigurationProfileEntry.dependency')} } }
precondition ${NAME} { description "${description}" documentation "${documentation}" status ${status:Enum('Status')} group "${group}" source { ${cursor} } }
procedure ${NAME} { description "${description}" documentation "${documentation}" status ${status:Enum('Status')} group "${group}" source { ${cursor} } }
selectioncondition ${NAME} { description "${description}" documentation "${documentation}" status ${status:Enum('Status')} group "${group}" source { ${cursor} } }
variantfunction ${NAME} { description "${description}" status ${status:Enum('Status')} group "${group}" arguments { in ${cstic:CrossReference('VariantFunctionArgument.characteristic')} } }
varianttable ${NAME} { description "${description}" status ${status:Enum('Status')} group "${group}" arguments { key ${cstic:CrossReference('VariantTableArgument.characteristic')} } }
characteristicgrup ${cgname} { description "${description}" ${cstic:CrossReference('CharacteristicGroup.characteristics')} ${cursor} }
'${valuename}' { description "${valuedescription}" documentation "${valuedocumentation}" }
billofmaterial { items { 0010 ${item:CrossReference('BOMItem.material')} } }
0010 ${item:CrossReference('BOMItem.material')}

configurationprofile '${profilename}' { status ${status:Enum('Status')} bomapplication SD02 uidesign ${ui_design:CrossReference('ConfigurationProfile.uidesign')} ${dnet:CrossReference('ConfigurationProfile.dependencyNets')} 0010 ${proc:CrossReference('ConfigurationProfileEntry.dependency')} }
description { EN "${description}" DE "${description}" FR "${description}" ES "${description}" PT "${description}" }
documentation { EN "${documentation}" DE "${documentation}" FR "${documentation}" ES "${documentation}" PT "${documentation}" }
